policies.title: Late Check-in Policy
policies.content: We accept check-ins 24/7. For arrivals after midnight, please call +91-XXX-XXXX to inform our night manager. Your room will be held regardless of arrival time.

policies.title: Parking Policy
policies.content: Valet parking is available at ₹500 per day. Self-parking is ₹300 per day. This fee is mentioned during booking and on our website footer.

policies.title: Housekeeping Policy
policies.content: Housekeeping operates 9 AM - 6 PM. Staff must knock three times and wait 30 seconds before entering. 'Do Not Disturb' signs are always respected.

policies.title: Complaint Resolution - Room Upgrade Policy
policies.content: For high-severity complaints, managers are authorized to offer complimentary upgrades or 20% discount on next stay.

policies.title: Smart TV Policy
policies.content: All rooms have Netflix-enabled smart TVs. Guests can log into their personal accounts. For technical issues, call ext. 555 for immediate IT support.

policies.title: AC Maintenance Policy
policies.content: AC issues must be resolved within 30 minutes. If not fixable, guest receives immediate room change or 50% refund for that night.
